# Add Issue/PR templates + CODE_OF_CONDUCT

**Labels:** `type:chore`, `prio:low`  
**Milestone:** v0.6 â€” Supply-chain, UX polish, Open-source hygiene  
**Epic:** Repo quality & contributor workflow

## Description

Reduce friction for contributors and maintain consistent issue/PR quality. Templates guide contributors to provide necessary information upfront.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Bug report template includes `raps --version`, OS, repro steps
- Feature request template includes expected output format + CI requirements

## Notes

Templates improve the quality of issues and PRs by ensuring contributors provide necessary context. CODE_OF_CONDUCT establishes community expectations.
